description.value:
You've mastered combat practices that let you get up close and bring down perpetrators alive.

You can use your Intelligence modifier on attack rolls when you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Devise a Stratagem]{Devise a Strategem} if you're using a weapon of the club group in one hand (like a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Club]{Club}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Staff]{Staff}, or @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Sap]{Sap}), in addition to the usual weapons, and those @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Strike]{Strikes} qualify for your @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Strategic Strike]{Strategic Strike}.

Additionally, you can make any of your Strikes nonlethal without taking the normal -2 penalty.
